alert.note: Alert for Kane; McHenry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 4:22PM CDT until April 19 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kane County in northeastern Illinois... Southern McHenry County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 421 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Genoa, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Elgin, Crystal Lake, Carpentersville, Algonquin, Lake in the Hills, McHenry, Woodstock, Huntley, Fox Lake, Island Lake, Marengo, Cary, Pingree Grove, Gilberts, West Dundee, Hampshire, Johnsburg, Lakemoor, Spring Grove and Fox River Grove. Including the following interstate... I-90 between mile markers 33 and 56. This includes... Mchenry County College, Mchenry County Fairgrounds, and Moraine Hills State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
